attributes.action: End this parliament and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses issue is a disgrace to the character of those in parliament and a betrayal of trust to the country. Trust and the mandate to serve has been significantly damaged and the country should have the final decision on whether Labour remain in power.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
